update ERP_TECH_ORDER set STATE=#STATE# where TECH_ORDER_ID in (select a.TECH_ORDER_ID from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL a left join ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL b on a.TECH_ORDER_ID=b.TECH_ORDER_ID and b.DEL_FLAG=0 where b.TECH_ORDER_DTL_ID in ($TECH_ORDER_DTL_IDS$) and b.STATE!='提交')

update ERP_TECH_ORDER b set b.STATE =(case when (select count(*) from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL a where STATE='提交' and a.TECH_ORDER_ID=b.TECH_ORDER_ID and a.DEL_FLAG=0)=0 then '待核价' else '提交' end) where b.TECH_ORDER_ID in (select TECH_ORDER_ID from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL where TECH_ORDER_DTL_ID in ($TECH_ORDER_DTL_IDS$) and DEL_FLAG=0 )

update ERP_TECH_ORDER b set b.STATE =(case when (select count(*) from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL a where IS_CAN_PRD_FLAG=1 and a.TECH_ORDER_ID=b.TECH_ORDER_ID and a.DEL_FLAG=0)=0 then '已核价' else '待核价' end) where b.TECH_ORDER_ID in (select TECH_ORDER_ID from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL where TECH_ORDER_DTL_ID in ($TECH_ORDER_DTL_IDS$) and DEL_FLAG=0 ) and STATE='待核价'
